mapper.select: SELECT u.uSerialNumber, m.mClass, s.location, s.sName, e.userName, e.rank, u.uAmount, u.uDate FROM Uses u INNER JOIN SubClass s ON u.scSerialNumber = s.scSerialNumber INNER JOIN Employee e ON u.userid = e.userid INNER JOIN MainClass m ON s.mcSerialNumber = m.mcSerialNumber

SELECT u.uSerialNumber, m.mClass, s.location, s.sName, e.userName, e.rank, u.uAmount, u.uDate FROM Uses u INNER JOIN SubClass s ON u.scSerialNumber = s.scSerialNumber INNER JOIN Employee e ON u.userid = e.userid INNER JOIN MainClass m ON s.mcSerialNumber = m.mcSerialNumber WHERE uDate = #{uDate}
SELECT s.sName, sum(u.uAmount*s.price) AS uAmount FROM Uses u INNER JOIN SubClass s ON u.scSerialNumber = s.scSerialNumber GROUP BY s.sName
